hibernate-mapping.query: select count(message.id) from Message as message, MessageRecipient as recipient where recipient.to = :to and recipient.read=:false and recipient.deleted=:false and recipient.messageId=message.id

select count(distinct message.thread) from Message as message, MessageRecipient as recipient where recipient.to = :to and recipient.read=:false and recipient.deleted=:false and recipient.messageId=message.id
from Message as message where message.thread = :thread order by message.datePosted asc
select count(distinct message.id) from Message as message where message.thread = :thread
from Message as message where message.id = :id
from Message as message where message.thread = :thread order by message.datePosted desc
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT {thread.*} from PROFILE_MESSAGE_RECIPIENTS_T recipient, PROFILE_MESSAGES_T message, PROFILE_MESSAGE_THREADS_T thread where recipient.UUID_TO = :to and recipient.MESSAGE_ID=message.ID and message.MESSAGE_THREAD=thread.ID group by thread.ID
hibernate-mapping.query: select count(distinct message.thread) from Message as message, MessageRecipient as recipient where recipient.to = :to and recipient.messageId=message.id
